trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKTA514_04047_DWARFMASTER03671_000_001<tab>Lali-ho there-ho, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. You'll be pleased to hear another recording device has arrived.
TEXT_LUCKTA514_04047_GLAGG_000_002<tab>I know what you're up to! Oh yes, I can see through your ruse!

TEXT_LUCKTA514_04047_GLAGG_000_003<tab>You pretend to be a friend while spreadin' vile rumors about me behind my back! Well, you're not goin' to drive me out of my own village! I'd rather die beardless and dry, you hear me!? <var 1A 02 /var>Beardless and dry<var 1A 01 /var>!
TEXT_LUCKTA514_04047_GLAGG_000_004<tab>Unnngh... Why am I... What am I doin'?
TEXT_LUCKTA514_04047_DWARFMASTER03671_000_005<tab>Well, it seems the visit I paid Glagg the other day backfired. Hard to tell if trying to reach out to him is better than not doing anything...
TEXT_LUCKTA514_04047_DWARFMASTER03671_000_006<tab>But that's enough about Glagg─let's talk about cheerier things.
TEXT_LUCKTA514_04047_DWARFMASTER03671_000_007<tab>Owing to everyone's hard work, the village is starting to look like itself again.
TEXT_LUCKTA514_04047_DWARFMASTER03671_000_008<tab>This had the effect of inspiring another one of us to volunteer to help. The fellow's been wanting to speak with you, so let me call him over.
TEXT_LUCKTA514_04047_DWARFMASTER03671_000_009<tab>Oi! <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>'s here, if you wanted a word.
TEXT_LUCKTA514_04047_VILLAGERC03954_000_010<tab>Chief. <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.

TEXT_LUCKTA514_04047_VILLAGERC03954_000_011<tab>I've always believed that our actions speak for us. And I've always respected them as dared to make things happen rather than sitting around. But sitting around's what I've been doing, while you labored to rebuild our village. And it made me ashamed of myself. I want to help too...if you'll have me?
TEXT_LUCKTA514_04047_DWARFMASTER03671_000_012<tab>Whatever problems we may have had in the past, having more comrades can only be a good thing. We'll let him join us, of course?
TEXT_LUCKTA514_04047_DWARFMASTER03671_000_013<tab>I'm glad we're on the same page.
TEXT_LUCKTA514_04047_VILLAGERC03954_100_013<tab>Thanks for giving me a chance. I'm ready to get to work─just tell me what you need me to do.
TEXT_LUCKTA514_04047_DWARFMASTER03671_000_014<tab>I'll start by having a chat with the fellow and see how he can contribute to the cause.
TEXT_LUCKTA514_04047_DWARFMASTER03671_000_015<tab>Perhaps you can look in on him later? I'm sure he'd appreciate hearing from you.
TEXT_LUCKTA514_04047_SYSTEM_000_017<tab>A weekly quest which continues the story is now available from the decisive dwarf in Komra.
TEXT_LUCKTA514_04047_SYSTEM_000_018<tab>Lend your aid and help the dwarves of Komra to rebuild their home.
TEXT_LUCKTA514_04047_SYSTEM_000_019<tab>You obtain a message from Konogg.

TEXT_LUCKTA514_04047_SYSTEM_000_020<tab>The message can be viewed in your <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Portable Archive<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, which is available under Collection in the Duty section of the main menu.
TEXT_LUCKTA514_04047_DWARFMASTER03671_000_020<tab>To be deleted.
TEXT_LUCKTA514_04047_VILLAGERD03954_000_025<tab>To be deleted.
TEXT_LUCKTA514_04047_VILLAGERB03954_000_030<tab>To be deleted.
